name: After Effects XML Project Template
summary: An AETX file is a project template created by Adobe After Effects, a motion graphics and visual effects application available for Windows and macOS. It contains one or more compositions made up of multiple layers, which may include imported media, shapes, text, and animation settings. After Effects users save AETX files in the XML format to create reusable templates for building multiple .AEP or .AEPX project files with the same structure.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
